info.title: Frineds Service Collection
info.description: This is an API that allows users to register, send freind requests, accept or reject friend requests, delete other user from friend list, check friend list, check incoming and outgoing friend requests and chtck friendship status with other users.

post.description: This endpoint registers user and returns the registered user id and username.

username: This field may not be blank.

post.description: This endpoint creates a friend request record and returns its data. Also if the friendship request record with mirored attributes from_user and to_user was created earlier this endpoint updates such friend request record with status equals to one and creates a new friends record.

example.message: Forbidden. Friend request is already exists

put.description: This endpoint updates friendship record and creates a new friends record if friendship status equals to one by provided friend request record id as url and user ids json as request body.

example.message: One or both users have not been found

delete.description: This endpoint deletes freind record and friend request record by provided users data in body and friends record ID in url.

get.description: This endpoint returns list with ids of user friends by provided user id as GET parameter.
This enpoint returns json containing lists of incoming and outgoing request for user by provided user ID as GET parameter
This endpoint returns user to user friendship status by provided user ids.

username: This field may not be blank.

example.detail: JSON parse error - Expecting value: line 3 column 1 (char 24)

example.message: Forbidden. Friend request is already exists
One or both users have not been found

username: This field may not be blank.
